portfolio.name: flavor-map
portfolio.title: The Flavor Map
portfolio.description: An exploration of data from The Flavor Bible using force simulations. We examine ingredient pairings and properties, as well as their relationship with various cuisines. Created with React, Redux, D3, and styled-components.

portfolio.name: chinese-vis
portfolio.title: Visualizing the Chinese Language
portfolio.description: A narrative visualization piece that examines various properties and relationships within Chinese characters and words. Contains custom parallel set and force-directed graph visualizations implemented using D3.

portfolio.name: net-set-poster-abstract
portfolio.title: NetSet
portfolio.description: An abstract for a poster presented at the IEEE Symposium on Visualization for Cyber Security at the 2018 IEEE VIS conference in Berlin, Germany, discussing a network metadata exploration tool that uses novel set visualization techniques.
